column5: Hey all you photographers, I subscribe to National Geographic and have been meaning to post this but keep forgetting.  NG has two "contests" going on right now, one, I guess it's not really a contest, but it does have to potential for you to have a photo published in their magazine    called your shot Look here  There are a few members here who I think could easily have some photo's published, but then I'm biased  On the other one you can win a trip to Guatemala, if you're so inclined to enter, again I have no doubt that more than one member here could have a shot   at it  Check it out  Maureen
